0: The Pas de la Dame Sauvage

--------------------
Text: The Pas de la Dame Sauvage (French; "Passage of arms of the wild lady") was a "pas d'armes" held at Ghent in 1470 by the Burgundian knight Claude de Vauldray in the presence of Duke Charles the Bold and his court.
